Group.Name: Resources
Group.Description__c: Configurations associated with Resources and Resource fields (e.g. Work Calendar)

Option.Name: allow-global-resources
Option.Help_Text__c: Resource can be specified as 'Global' by checking "Allow Timecards Without Assignment" but that would be in effect only if this config value is true.
Option.Description__c: Resource can be specified as 'Global' by checking "Allow Timecards Without Assignment" but that would be in effect only if this config value is true.

Option.Name: close-assignments-for-expense-when-resource-inactivated
Option.Help_Text__c: If set to true, when a resource is deactivated assigments for the resource will be marked closed for expense entry.
Option.Description__c: If set to true, when a resource is deactivated assigments for the resource will be marked closed for expense entry.

Option.Name: close-assignments-for-time-when-resource-inactivated
Option.Help_Text__c: If set to true, when a resource is deactivated assigments for the resource will be marked closed for time entry.
Option.Description__c: If set to true, when a resource is deactivated assigments for the resource will be marked closed for time entry.

Option.Name: default-work-calendar-hierarchy
Option.Help_Text__c: Chooses whether, on insert, Resources should inherit their Default Work Calendar (if left blank) from the Work Calendar on their Region ('Region__c'), Practice ('Practice__c'), or Group ('Group__c').
Option.Description__c: Chooses whether, on insert, Resources should inherit their Default Work Calendar (if left blank) from the Work Calendar on their Region ('Region__c'), Practice ('Practice__c'), or Group ('Group__c').

Option.Name: default-work-hours-per-day
Option.Help_Text__c: This number is the org-wide default for "standard work hours per day" in cases where it is not specified in a Resource's Work Calendar. This is for the conversion ratio between hourly and daily rates for the Resource's Assignments.
Option.Description__c: This number is the org-wide default for "standard work hours per day" in cases where it is not specified in a Resource's Work Calendar. This is for the conversion ratio between hourly and daily rates for the Resource's Assignments.

Option.Name: use-is-resource-flag
Option.Help_Text__c: If set to false, then no filtering. Default true - only Contact records with 'Is Resource' checked will be used for PSE Resource logic such as defaulting work calendars and working with Current Time Periods.
Option.Description__c: If set to false, then no filtering. Default true - only Contact records with 'Is Resource' checked will be used for PSE Resource logic such as defaulting work calendars and working with Current Time Periods.

Group.Name: Scheduled Backlog
Group.Description__c: Settings for calculating scheduled and unscheduled backlog

Option.Name: assignment-batch-size
Option.Description__c: Number of assignments in a batch when calculating backlog for forecasting

Option.Name: backlog-statements-remaining-threshold
Option.Description__c: Adjust to modify handling of script line governor limit by backlog batches

Option.Name: batch-size
Option.Description__c: The number of projects to process in a single batch when calculating backlog. This number may need to be adjusted downward if governor errors are encountered with backlog.

Option.Name: unscheduled-backlog-time-period-types
Option.Description__c: A list of Time Period Type picklist values that should have unscheduled backlog calculated

Option.Name: use-old-backlog-calc
Option.Help_Text__c: Determines whether to copy Backlog fields to RPG/Project from RPG/Project Actuals or from Backlog Detail records. Set to false if using "new" Backlog process as of the Spring '10 (R2) release, which does not use RPG/Project Actuals for Backlog, or to true if using old Backlog process.
Option.Description__c: Determines whether to copy Backlog fields to RPG/Project from RPG/Project Actuals. Set to false if using "new" Backlog process as of the Spring '10 (R2) release, which does not use RPG/Project Actuals for Backlog, or to true if using old Backlog process

Group.Name: Self Assignment
Group.Description__c: Configurations related to Self-Assignment UI

Option.Name: project-list-load-limit
Option.Description__c: Number of Projects to be loaded in project drop down list.

Option.Name: project-lookup-columns
Option.Help_Text__c: List of Project fields (fully-qualified API names/paths) to display on columns for Project lookup pop-up in Self-Assignment UI. Recommend at most 4 fields/columns. Default value: Name,pse__Account__r.Name,pse__Stage__c,pse__Region__r.Name
Option.Description__c: List of Project fields (fully-qualified API names) to display on columns for Project lookup pop-up in Self-Assignment UI. Recommend at most 4 fields. Default value: Name,pse__Account__r.Name,pse__Stage__c,pse__Region__r.Name

Option.Name: self-assignment-default-cost-rate
Option.Description__c: If true, the Resource's default cost rate value will be copyed to the Self Assignment cost rate amount. If false, not.

Option.Name: self-assignment-holidays
Option.Description__c: If true, Self Assignment will respect Holidays for the Resource's Work Calendar while creating the Assignment Schedule. If false, Holidays will be ignored (default behaviour).

Group.Name: SFDC Style Paginator
Group.Description__c: This group holds settings required for SFDC style paginator. These settings can tune the number of default visible items on a page. This paginator is currently used on Mass Assign Resources/Projects on Project/Resource

Option.Name: items-shown-bydefault
Option.Help_Text__c: This options configures the number of items displayed by default by the paginator. The default code value is 5, in case this option is missing.
Option.Description__c: This options configures the number of items displayed by default by the paginator. The default code value is 5, in case this option is missing.

Option.Name: SecurityModel
Option.Description__c: Security Model for Skills

Group.Name: Skills Capacity
Group.Description__c: Preferences and thresholds for the skills capacity matrix

Option.Name: AlertLowAverageValue
Option.Description__c: Average skill values at or below this value are flagged with an alert icon

Option.Name: AlertLowHighValue
Option.Description__c: High skill values at or below this value are flagged with an alert icon

Option.Name: AlertLowNumberWithSkillPercent
Option.Description__c: "Number with skill" percentage (number of resources with skill divided by open requests) at or below this value are flagged with an alert icon

Group.Name: Skills Entry
Group.Description__c: Configuration for how skills entry and updating is handled

Option.Name: Disregard-Skill-Zones
Option.Help_Text__c: If false, Resource/user can enter ratings for Skills/Certs that have a Skill Zone that matches the RPG of Resource/user. If true ,Resource/user can enter ratings for all available Skills/Certs.
Option.Description__c: If false, Resource/user can enter ratings for Skills/Certs that have a Skill Zone that matches the RPG of Resource/user. If true ,Resource/user can enter ratings for all available Skills/Certs.

Option.Name: MaxSearchResults
Option.Description__c: Maximum number of resource records that can be returned in the "Other" search box in Skills and Certifications Matrix

Option.Name: resource-record-limit
Option.Help_Text__c: Maximum number of records to evaluate permission controls against. This limits the number of queries against contact records during evaluation of permission controls on the Skills Matrix. This overrides the value in the Default Record Limit field of the Permission Control Settings custom setting. If your organization contains a large number of active resources you may have to increase this value. The default value is 1000.

Option.Name: SearchResultsPageSize
Option.Description__c: Number of resource records shown per page in the "Other" search box in Skills and Certifications Matrix

Group.Name: Timecard
Group.Description__c: Configurations related to Timecards and Timecard Splits

Option.Name: additional-fields
Option.Help_Text__c: List of timecard fields (fully-qualified API names/paths) to display on notes detail section in new timcard UI.
Option.Description__c: List of timecard fields (fully-qualified API names/paths) to display on notes detail section in new timcard UI.

Option.Name: allow-post-submit-edits-after-close
Option.Help_Text__c: If true, 'Closed for Time Entry' checkboxes on parent Projects/Asssignments/Milestones only stop time entry of new or un-submitted Timecards. Post-submit Admin/Approver/Billing Edits would be allowed, subject to existing permissions. Default false (existing behavior, closure blocks material edits).
Option.Description__c: If true, 'Closed for Time Entry' checkboxes on parent Projects/Asssignments/Milestones only stop time entry of new or un-submitted Timecards. Post-submit Admin/Approver/Billing Edits would be allowed, subject to existing permissions. Default false.

Option.Name: allow-timecard-with-negative-hours
Option.Help_Text__c: Config is used to control the save/submit of timecard with negative hours. If it is true, timecards with negative hours can be save/submitted else warning will be shown on ui.
Option.Description__c: Config is used to control the save/submit of timecard with negative hours. If it is true, timecards with negative hours can be save/submitted else warning will be shown on ui.

Option.Name: assignment-load-limit
Option.Description__c: Number of Assignments to be loaded for the timecard assignment drop down

Option.Name: assignment-lookup-columns
Option.Help_Text__c: List of API names of assignment fields to display as columns on the Project/Assignment lookup in the enhanced Time Entry page. Do not include the pse__ namespace prefix in the API name of a field. The default value is Name, Nick_Name__c.
Option.Description__c: List of API names of assignment fields to display as columns on the Project/Assignment lookup in the enhanced Time Entry page. Do not include the pse__ namespace prefix in the API name of a field. The default value is Name, Nick_Name__c.

Option.Name: assignment-project-editable-after-save
Option.Help_Text__c: If true, the Project and/or Assignment can be changed as long as Timecard is in Saved Status and CalculationMode for Actuals is set to Scheduled.
Option.Description__c: If true, the Project and/or Assignment can be changed as long as Timecard is in Saved Status and CalculationMode for Actuals is set to Scheduled.

Option.Name: assignment-project-editable-after-save-audit-notes
Option.Help_Text__c: The "assignment-project-editable-after-save" gives user access to change the project/assignment for the saved timecards but this require audit note to be set for timecard. Audit notes can be set by this config. This config contains four tokens, which will be replaced during update. The valid token names are as follows:- <user> - the current user who is performing the action in the TC UI <date> - today's date <oldproject> - the original project name <newproject> - the new project name Default value:- User <user> changed the Project from <oldproject> to <newproject> on <date> Also since the Audit Notes filed on TCH is limited up to 255 characters user should avoid adding a value more then 255 char for this config other wise the time card will not be saved.
Option.Description__c: The "assignment-project-editable-after-save" gives user access to change the project/assignment for the saved timecards but this require audit note to be set for timecard. Audit notes can be set by this config.

Option.Name: assignment-strict-date-restrictions-only-pre-submit
Option.Help_Text__c: Limits the strict assignment date restrictions to only apply if the Timecard Submitted flag was false prior to edit. Allows setup of approvals/rejections without approvers having to meet date requirement - only submitters.
Option.Description__c: Limits the strict assignment date restrictions to only apply if the Timecard Submitted flag was false prior to edit.

Option.Name: assignment-strict-end-date-restriction
Option.Help_Text__c: Stricter than assignments-load-date-restriction and affects both native/admin edit and the TC UI. Forces TC End Date to be no earlier than Assignment Start Date and enforces 0 hours for days later than Assignment End Date.
Option.Description__c: Stricter than assignments-load-date-restriction and affects both native/admin edit and the TC UI. Forces TC End Date to be no earlier than Assignment Start Date and enforces 0 hours for days later than Assignment End Date.

Option.Name: assignment-strict-start-date-restriction
Option.Help_Text__c: Stricter than assignments-load-date-restriction and affects both native/admin edit and the TC UI. Forces TC Start Date to be no later than Assignment End Date and enforces 0 hours for days earlier than Assignment Start Date.
Option.Description__c: Stricter than assignments-load-date-restriction and affects both native/admin edit and the TC UI. Forces TC Start Date to be no later than Assignment End Date and enforces 0 hours for days earlier than Assignment Start Date.

Option.Name: assignment-tooltip-fields
Option.Description__c: List of assignment fields to be shown as tooltip on timecard entry ui.

Option.Name: assignments-load-date-restriction
Option.Description__c: If true, restricts assignments to those with start and end dates overlapping with the time period of this timecard

Option.Name: assignments-load-status-values
Option.Description__c: List of assignment status values to be used while loading the assignments from db.

Option.Name: auto-share-with-project-manager-user
Option.Help_Text__c: Defines the level of sharing with the project manager for newly created timecards. You can choose from the values None, Read or Edit. The default value is None.
Option.Description__c: Defines the level of sharing with the project manager for newly created timecards. You can choose from the values None, Read or Edit. The default value is None.

Option.Name: auto-share-with-project-resources
Option.Help_Text__c: Defines the level of sharing with assigned project resources for newly created timecards. You can choose from the values None, Read or Edit. The default value is None.
Option.Description__c: Defines the level of sharing with assigned project resources for newly created timecards. You can choose from the values None, Read or Edit. The default value is None.

Option.Name: billable-header-field-position-is-left
Option.Help_Text__c: If the Billable field is configured to be displayed, determines whether it should be displayed to the left or the right of Hours in the timecard header line of the Timecard UI.
Option.Description__c: If the Billable field is configured to be displayed, determines whether it should be displayed to the left or the right of Hours in the timecard header line of the Timecard UI.

Option.Name: check-for-previous-week-tc
Option.Help_Text__c: If true, on initial load of new Timecard UI it will check for previous week timecards. If there is no timecards filled for the previous week, UI will show confirmation window asking user to load previous week or current week. If false, work as normal i.e no confirmation window and load current week.
Option.Description__c: If true, on initial load of new Timecard UI it will check for previous week timecards. If there is no timecards filled for the previous week, UI will show confirmation window asking user to load previous week or current week. If false, work as normal.

Option.Name: combine-similar-timecards
Option.Help_Text__c: Indicates whether timecards with exactly the same combination of week, project, assignment, resource, billable, project, methodology, location, travel are combined on the Timecard Entry page. When this occurs, hours and notes fields are combined and other day-based fields are set to the values of the first timecard row included in an aggregated timecard line.
Option.Description__c: Indicates whether timecards with exactly the same combination of week, project, assignment, resource, billable, project, methodology, location, travel are combined on the Timecard Entry page.

Option.Name: copy-additional-fields-from-previous-week
Option.Help_Text__c: If true Additional Fields will be copied from previous week timecards.
Option.Description__c: If true Additional Fields will be copied from previous week timecards.

Option.Name: copy-etc-from-previous-week
Option.Help_Text__c: If true ETC field will be copied from previous week timecards
Option.Description__c: If true ETC field will be copied from previous week timecards

Option.Name: copy-hours-from-previous-week
Option.Help_Text__c: If true Hour fields like Monday Hours, Tuesday Hours etc will be copied from previous week timecards
Option.Description__c: If true Hour fields like Monday Hours, Tuesday Hours etc will be copied from previous week timecards

Option.Name: copy-locations-from-previous-week
Option.Help_Text__c: If true Location Information fields like Location Mon etc will be copied from previous week timecards
Option.Description__c: If true Location Information fields like Location Mon etc will be copied from previous week timecards

Option.Name: copy-methodology-from-previous-week
Option.Help_Text__c: If true Methodology field will be copied from previous week timecards
Option.Description__c: If true Methodology field will be copied from previous week timecards

Option.Name: copy-milestone-from-previous-week
Option.Help_Text__c: If true Milestones will be copied from previous week's timecards
Option.Description__c: If true Milestones will be copied from previous week's timecards

Option.Name: copy-notes-from-previous-week
Option.Help_Text__c: If true Notes will be copied from previous week timecards
Option.Description__c: If true Notes will be copied from previous week timecards

Option.Name: copy-phase-from-previous-week
Option.Help_Text__c: If true Phase field will be copied from previous week timecards
Option.Description__c: If true Phase field will be copied from previous week timecards

Option.Name: copy-schedule-assignment-daily-notes
Option.Help_Text__c: If set to true, the Copy From Schedule functionality populates the Notes fields for each day on the Timecard if it finds Assignment Daily Notes child records on the Assignment for that day. (default false)
Option.Description__c: If set to true, the Copy From Schedule functionality populates the Notes fields for each day on the Timecard if it finds Assignment Daily Notes child records on the Assignment for that day. (default false)

Option.Name: copy-travel-from-previous-week
Option.Help_Text__c: If true Travel Information fields like Travel Week, Travel Mon etc will be copied from previous week timecards
Option.Description__c: If true Travel Information fields like Travel Week, Travel Mon etc will be copied from previous week timecards

Option.Name: create-time-date-records
Option.Help_Text__c: If set to true, always creates 7 child Time Date records to facilitate reporting, each containing a date and the hours for that date. Default false.
Option.Description__c: If set to true, always creates 7 child Time Date records to facilitate reporting, each containing a date and the hours for that date. Default false.

Option.Name: day-hour-auto-revert-ceiling
Option.Help_Text__c: Config to control max auto-revert hour value on the new TC UI.
Option.Description__c: Config to control max auto-revert hour value on the new TC UI.

Option.Name: day-hour-auto-revert-floor
Option.Help_Text__c: Config to control min auto-revert hour value on the new TC UI.
Option.Description__c: Config to control min auto-revert hour value on the new TC UI.

Option.Name: default-billable
Option.Description__c: If true, billable drop down field on timecard ui will be shown as disabled i.e non-editable by user .

Option.Name: default-milestone-to-assignment-milestone
Option.Help_Text__c: This config flag determines whether a Timecard entered with no Milestone should have its Milestone defaulted from its Assignment.
Option.Description__c: This config flag determines whether a Timecard entered with no Milestone should have its Milestone defaulted from its Assignment.

Option.Name: default-single-resource-search-result
Option.Help_Text__c: When true and the Resource Lookup popup on the new timecard UI returns only one result, the Resource Lookup popup is automatically closed and the resource field is set to returned resource.
Option.Description__c: When true and the Resource Lookup popup on the new timecard UI returns only one result, the Resource Lookup popup is automatically closed and the resource field is set to returned resource.

Option.Name: default-week-offset
Option.Help_Text__c: Config is used to control the default loaded week in TC UI. If the value is null or blank, it will load the Today's week on UI load, if value is -1 then load the previous week, if value is 1 then load the next week and so on.
Option.Description__c: Config is used to control the default loaded week in TC UI. If the value is null or blank, it will load the Today's week on UI load, if value is -1 then load the previous week, if value is 1 then load the next week and so on.

Option.Name: disable-cache
Option.Help_Text__c: The TC UI caches all Assignments/Projects/Milestones for a Resource while it loads. This may hit Salesforce's View State limit if the Resource has many Assignments/Projects with many open Milestones. Setting to true will minimize this cache.
Option.Description__c: The TC UI caches all Assignments/Projects/Milestones for a Resource while it loads. This may hit Salesforce's View State limit if the Resource has many Assignments/Projects with many open Milestones. Setting to true will minimize this cache.

Option.Name: display-account-on-resource-lookup
Option.Help_Text__c: [DEPRECATED] Use resource-lookup-columns instead and include 'Account.Name' in delimited list of fields to show Account in column on Resource lookup pop-up.
Option.Description__c: [DEPRECATED] Use resource-lookup-columns instead and include 'Account.Name' in delimited list of fields to show Account in column on Resource lookup pop-up.

Option.Name: empty-timecard-lines-to-append-by-default
Option.Description__c: This is the minimum no of lines that will be always available for new timecard entry.

Option.Name: empty-timecard-lines-to-append-on-add-lines
Option.Description__c: These many empty timecard lines will be added, when add lines button will be clicked.

Option.Name: errmsg-no-resource-found
Option.Description__c: Error message to be shown when there is no resource available to be shown on timecard ui.

Value.Value__c: No Resource record found for your Salesforce user.

Option.Name: est-vs-actuals-timecard-status
Option.Description__c: The value(s) of the Timecard Status field to use when determining if the timecard should be used in the calculation of Estimates vs Actuals

Option.Name: force-daily-timecard-splits
Option.Help_Text__c: If set to true, always splits Timecard Headers into 7 daily Timecard Splits, regardless of Time Periods and value of Timecard_Split_Time_Period_Types config. Default false.
Option.Description__c: If set to true, always splits Timecard Headers into 7 daily Timecard Splits, regardless of Time Periods and value of Timecard_Split_Time_Period_Types config. Default false.

Option.Name: hide-billable-column
Option.Help_Text__c: Indicates whether the billable column on the Timecard Entry page is hidden. When true, the column is hidden and the billable checkbox defaults to selected. The default value is false.
Option.Description__c: Indicates whether the billable column on the Timecard Entry page is hidden. When true, the column is hidden and the billable checkbox defaults to selected. The default value is false.

Option.Name: hide-copy-from-previous-week-button
Option.Help_Text__c: Indicates whether the Copy From Previous Week button on the new timecard UI is hidden. The default value is false.
Option.Description__c: Indicates whether the Copy From Previous Week button on the new timecard UI is hidden. The default value is false.

Option.Name: hide-copy-schedules-button
Option.Help_Text__c: Indicates whether the Copy Schedules button on the new timecard UI is hidden. The default value is false.
Option.Description__c: Indicates whether the Copy Schedules button on the new timecard UI is hidden. The default value is false.

Option.Name: hide-notes-column
Option.Help_Text__c: When true, the Notes column that normally appears on the Timecard Entry page is hidden. The default value is false.
Option.Description__c: When true, the Notes column that normally appears on the Timecard Entry page is hidden. The default value is false.

Option.Name: hide-save-button
Option.Help_Text__c: Indicates whether the Save button on the new timecard UI is hidden. The default value is false.
Option.Description__c: Indicates whether the Save button on the new timecard UI is hidden. The default value is false.

Option.Name: hide-submit-button
Option.Help_Text__c: Indicates whether the Submit button on the new timecard UI is hidden. The default value is false.
Option.Description__c: Indicates whether the Submit button on the new timecard UI is hidden. The default value is false.

Option.Name: hide-timecard-hours-in-calculated-mode
Option.Help_Text__c: If selected and Task Time Entry Mode is set to Calculated, only one row of task hours is displayed. The default value of the checkbox is clear.
Option.Description__c: If selected and Task Time Entry Mode is set to Calculated, only one row of task hours is displayed. The default value of the checkbox is clear.

Option.Name: hide-view-edit-details-link
Option.Help_Text__c: If true and Task Time Entry Mode is Current, the View or Edit Details links shown when hovering over a timecard line are hidden. If true and Task Time Entry Mode is not Current, the Notes tab is hidden on the links. The default value is false.
Option.Description__c: If true and Task Time Entry Mode is Current, the View or Edit Details links shown when hovering over a timecard line are hidden. If true and Task Time Entry Mode is not Current, the Notes tab is hidden on the links. The default value is false.

Option.Name: holiday-color-code
Option.Help_Text__c: The given field/config is used to color-code the date-column-heading for a Work Calendar Holiday for the selected Resource on the Timecard UI.
Option.Description__c: The given field/config is used to color-code the date-column-heading for a Work Calendar Holiday for the selected Resource on the Timecard UI. Possible values for examples can be: - #93B0FB, red, blue etc.

Option.Name: max-resource-hours-per-day
Option.Help_Text__c: Restrict the maximum number of timecard hours per day, per resource to the value provided. NOTE: Timecard config create-time-date-records must be set to true for this feature to function.
Option.Description__c: Restrict the maximum number of timecard hours per day, per resource to the value provided. NOTE: Timecard config create-time-date-records must be set to true for this feature to function.

Option.Name: maximum-resource-hours-per-week
Option.Help_Text__c: Maximum number of hours a resource can enter for a timecard week. If exceeded, an error message is displayed. Enter a percentage value and symbol, eg. 90%, to specify a maximum percentage of work calendar hours.
Option.Description__c: Maximum number of hours a resource can enter for a timecard week. If exceeded, an error message is displayed. Enter a percentage value and symbol, eg. 90%, to specify a maximum percentage of work calendar hours.

Option.Name: methodology-field-position-is-popup
Option.Description__c: This config flag determines whether methodology field should be display on notes popup or at front page.

Option.Name: methodology-headerfield-position-is-left
Option.Help_Text__c: If the Methodology field is configured to be displayed, determines whether it should be displayed to the left or the right of Hours in the timecard header line of the Timecard UI.
Option.Description__c: If the Methodology field is configured to be displayed, determines whether it should be displayed to the left or the right of Hours in the timecard header line of the Timecard UI.

Option.Name: milestone-field-position-is-popup
Option.Description__c: This config flag determines whether milestone field should be display on notes popup or at front page.

Option.Name: milestone-header-field-position-is-left
Option.Help_Text__c: If the Milestone field is configured to be displayed, determines whether it should be displayed to the left or the right of Hours in the timecard header line of the Timecard UI.
Option.Description__c: If the Milestone field is configured to be displayed, determines whether it should be displayed to the left or the right of Hours in the timecard header line of the Timecard UI.

Option.Name: minimum-resource-hours-per-week
Option.Help_Text__c: Minimum number of hours a resource can enter for a timecard week. If weekly hours are lower than this amount, an error message is displayed. Enter a percentage value and symbol, eg. 30%, to specify a minimum percentage of work calendar hours.
Option.Description__c: Minimum number of hours a resource can enter for a timecard week. If weekly hours are lower than this amount, an error message is displayed. Enter a percentage value and symbol, eg. 30%, to specify a minimum percentage of work calendar hours.

Option.Name: missing-timecard-create-est-vs-actuals
Option.Help_Text__c: [DEPRECATED - Missing Timecards should not affect Est Vs Actuals] Whether to create an Est Vs Actuals record when generating missing timecards for each assignment that does not have an associated timecard
Option.Description__c: [DEPRECATED - Missing Timecards should not affect Est Vs Actuals] Whether to create an Est Vs Actuals record when generating missing timecards for each assignment that does not have an associated timecard

Option.Name: missing-timecard-status
Option.Description__c: The value(s) of the Timecard Status field to use when determining which resources have missing timecards. Anything not on the list will be considered missing

Option.Name: nickname-editable
Option.Help_Text__c: Config is used to control whether the assignment nickname is editable or not.
Option.Description__c: Config is used to control whether the assignment nickname is editable or not.

Option.Name: note-location-allowed
Option.Description__c: If true, location field will be shown in timacard entry note popup dialog

Option.Name: note-primary-location-allowed
Option.Help_Text__c: If true, then primary Location drop-down will be displayed on TC UI.{crlf}And "use-project-location-records" will configure whether it will bind to Primary Location picklist or Project Location object.
Option.Description__c: If true, then primary Location drop-down will be displayed on TC UI.

Option.Name: phase-field-position-is-popup
Option.Description__c: This config flag determines whether phase field should be display on notes popup or at front page.

Option.Name: phase-header-field-position-is-left
Option.Help_Text__c: If the Phase field is configured to be displayed, determines whether it should be displayed to the left or the right of Hours in the timecard header line of the Timecard UI.
Option.Description__c: If the Phase field is configured to be displayed, determines whether it should be displayed to the left or the right of Hours in the timecard header line of the Timecard UI.

Option.Name: pre-populate-task
Option.Help_Text__c: If selected, tasks are pre populated for the selected user and project. The default value of the checkbox is clear.
Option.Description__c: If selected, tasks are pre populated for the selected user and project. The default value of the checkbox is clear.

Option.Name: primary-loc-headerfield-position-is-left
Option.Help_Text__c: If the Primary Location field is configured to be displayed, determines whether it should be displayed to the left or the right of Hours in the timecard header line of the Timecard UI.
Option.Description__c: If the Primary Location field is configured to be displayed, determines whether it should be displayed to the left or the right of Hours in the timecard header line of the Timecard UI.

Option.Name: primary-location-field-position-is-popup
Option.Help_Text__c: When note-primary-location-allowed is set to true, determines whether the Primary Location field appears in the Notes section or the timecard line.
Option.Description__c: When note-primary-location-allowed is set to true, determines whether the Primary Location field appears in the Notes section or the timecard line.

Option.Name: proj-assig-dropdown-account-custom-field
Option.Description__c: timecard project/Assignment account drop down display value

Option.Name: project-lookup-columns
Option.Help_Text__c: List of API names of project fields to display as columns on the Project/Assignment lookup in the enhanced Time Entry page. Do not include the pse__ namespace prefix in the API name of a field. The default value is Name, Account__r.Name.
Option.Description__c: List of API names of project fields to display as columns on the Project/Assignment lookup in the enhanced Time Entry page. Do not include the pse__ namespace prefix in the API name of a field. The default value is Name, Account__r.Name.

Option.Name: project-tooltip-fields
Option.Description__c: List of project fields to be shown as tooltip on timecard entry ui.

Option.Name: projects-load-date-restriction
Option.Description__c: If true, restricts projects to those with start and end dates overlapping with the time period of this timecard

Option.Name: resource-access
Option.Description__c: If config value equals to 'all' , means all resources along with current user resources will be loaded. Else if value equals to 'resource' or null, only current user resources will be loaded.

Option.Name: resource-load-limit
Option.Description__c: Number of Resources to be loaded for the timecard resource drop down

Option.Name: resource-lookup-columns
Option.Help_Text__c: List of Resource fields (full API names/paths, no pse namespace prefix) to display on columns for Resource lookup pop-up in new Timecard UI. Recommend at most 5 fields/columns. Default value: Name,Account.Name,Region__r.Name,Practice__r.Name,Group__r.Name
Option.Description__c: List of Resource fields (full API names/paths, no pse namespace prefix) to display on columns for Resource lookup pop-up in new Timecard UI. Recommend at most 5 fields/columns. Default value: Name,Account.Name,Region__r.Name,Practice__r.Name,Group__r.Name

Option.Name: restrict-task-based-on-milestone
Option.Help_Text__c: If selected, the tasks that are pre populated are based on the selected milestone. This setting is deselected by default.
Option.Description__c: If selected, the tasks that are pre populated are based on the selected milestone. This setting is deselected by default.

Option.Name: save-submit-batch-size
Option.Description__c: Size of Number of timecards to be save/submit in one batch execution.

Option.Name: save-timecard-with-zero-hours
Option.Help_Text__c: Config is used to control the saving of timecard with zero hours. If it is true, timecards with zero are saved else not saved(warning will be shown on ui).
Option.Description__c: Config is used to control the saving of timecard with zero hours. If it is true, timecards with zero are saved else not saved(warning will be shown on ui).

Option.Name: schedule-assignment-tooltip-fields
Option.Help_Text__c: API names of assignment fields to be shown when hovering over the tooltip icon in the Schedule section of a timecard.
Option.Description__c: API names of assignment fields to be shown when hovering over the tooltip icon in the Schedule section of a timecard.

Option.Name: schedule-editable
Option.Help_Text__c: Determines the behavior of Scheduled grid on Timecard screen. It has three possible values : ALL , INTERNAL and NONE
Option.Description__c: Determines the behavior of Scheduled grid on Timecard screen. It has three possible values : ALL (are editable) , INTERNAL (only internal ones are editable) and NONE

Option.Name: schedule-grid-weekend-delta
Option.Description__c: Config value will be used to show the schedules for no of weeks ahead of timecard weekend. Possible value for config will be 0, 1, 2 so on. If value = 0, Schedule grid will show schedules zero week ahead of timecard i.e current week and next week.

Option.Name: schedule-project-tooltip-fields
Option.Help_Text__c: API names of project fields to be shown when hovering over the tooltip icon in the Schedule section of a timecard.
Option.Description__c: API names of project fields to be shown when hovering over the tooltip icon in the Schedule section of a timecard.

Option.Name: set-owner-to-resource-salesforce-user
Option.Description__c: Whether to set the owner of the timecard to the the assigned resource user

Option.Name: show-alert-for-nonzero-holiday-hours
Option.Help_Text__c: If true, will show alert if non-zero value is entered on the Timecard UI for a day that is a Holiday (non-weekend day having zero hours) in the selected Resource's Work Calendar.
Option.Description__c: If true, will show alert if non-zero value is entered on the Timecard UI for a day that is a Holiday (non-weekend day having zero hours) in the selected Resource's Work Calendar.

Option.Name: show-alert-for-nonzero-weekend-hours
Option.Help_Text__c: If true, will show alert if non-zero value is entered on the Timecard UI for a day that is a weekend day (zero hours based on pattern) in the selected Resource's Work Calendar.
Option.Description__c: If true, will show alert if non-zero value is entered on the Timecard UI for a day that is a weekend day (zero hours based on pattern) in the selected Resource's Work Calendar.

Option.Name: show-easy-entry-popup
Option.Help_Text__c: Indicates whether the easy entry popup appears on the Time Entry page when you double-click an editable hour cell on a timecard row or press the DOWN ARROW key while that cell is selected.
Option.Description__c: Indicates whether the easy entry popup appears on the Time Entry page when you double-click an editable hour cell on a timecard row or press the DOWN ARROW key while that cell is selected.

Option.Name: show-milestone-as-field
Option.Help_Text__c: Contains field whose value will be shown on timecard UI milestone drop down list. If these are missing or null, the TC UI just continues to show the Milestone name fields of the available Milestones in the drop-down list. No lookup __r references are supported, only fields directly on the Milestone can be used.
Option.Description__c: Contains field whose value will be shown on timecard UI milestone drop down list. If these are missing or null, the TC UI just continues to show the Milestone name fields of the available Milestones in the drop-down list. No lookup __r references allowed.

Option.Name: show-projectName-assignment-dropdown
Option.Help_Text__c: Config is used to control the display of assignment project name value in the assignment display name on TC project/assignment overlay.
Option.Description__c: Config is used to control the display of assignment project name value in the assignment display name on TC project/assignment overlay.

Option.Name: show-recall-on-timecards
Option.Help_Text__c: Config is used to control the display recall link on each submitted timecard. On click it, a recall overlay will be open, where we need to enter the comment and recall the approval request for timecard.
Option.Description__c: Config is used to control the display recall link on each submitted timecard. On click it, a recall overlay will be open, where we need to enter the comment and recall the approval request for timecard.

Option.Name: show-schedule-grid
Option.Description__c: If true show the schedule grid on timecard ui, else if false it will not be shown.

Option.Name: show-schedule-grid-expanded-by-default
Option.Description__c: If true, schedule grid will be shown expanded on Timecard entry by default.

Option.Name: show-schedule-tooltips
Option.Help_Text__c: If set to true, shows the tooltip icon next to assignment name on Schedule section of TC UI.Default false (existing behavior, no tooltip column)
Option.Description__c: If set to true, shows the tooltip icon next to assignment name on Schedule section of TC UI.Default false (existing behavior, no tooltip column)

Option.Name: show-timecard-etc
Option.Description__c: config to show or hide etc field

Option.Name: show-timecard-methodology
Option.Description__c: If true, timecard methodology field will be show on timecard UI.

Option.Name: show-timecard-milestone
Option.Description__c: config to show or hide milestone select list

Option.Name: show-timecard-phase
Option.Description__c: If true, timecard Phase field will be show on timecard UI.

Option.Name: show-travel
Option.Help_Text__c: Indicates whether the Travel checkboxes on the new timecard UI are to be displayed. The default value is true.
Option.Description__c: Indicates whether the Travel checkboxes on the new timecard UI are to be displayed. The default value is true.

Option.Name: submit-timecard-with-zero-hours
Option.Help_Text__c: Config is used to control the submit of timecard with zero hours. If it is true, timecards with zero can be submitted else warning will be shown on ui.
Option.Description__c: Config is used to control the submit of timecard with zero hours. If it is true, timecards with zero can be submitted else warning will be shown on ui.

Option.Name: task-time-entry-assignment-filter
Option.Description__c: Indicates whether the resource can only select tasks that they have an assignment for when entering time against project tasks. When this option is not selected, users can enable this feature on the Time Entry page.

Option.Name: task-time-entry-date-filter
Option.Description__c: Defines the filtering behavior on task dates when choosing tasks to enter time against. Set to None or Overlap. If None, no filtering occurs. If Overlap, tasks are listed only when the timecard and selectable tasks have some overlap on dates.

Option.Name: task-time-entry-mode
Option.Help_Text__c: The time entry mode to use when entering task time for a timecard row. You can choose one of these values: Adjust up, Current, Calculated, or Freeform. The default value is Current.
Option.Description__c: The time entry mode to use when entering task time for a timecard row. You can choose one of these values: Adjust up, Current, Calculated, or Freeform. The default value is Current.

Option.Name: tc-fields-to-copy-from-schedule
Option.Help_Text__c: Specify Timecard Header fields to copy from schedule. Only these hour fields are valid for this config "Monday_Hours__c,Tuesday_Hours__c ,Wednesday_Hours__c ,Thursday_Hours__c,Friday_Hours__c ,Saturday_Hours__c,Sunday_Hours__c"
Option.Description__c: Specify Timecard Header fields to copy from schedule. Only these hour fields are valid for this config "Monday_Hours__c,Tuesday_Hours__c ,Wednesday_Hours__c ,Thursday_Hours__c,Friday_Hours__c ,Saturday_Hours__c,Sunday_Hours__c"

Option.Name: tc-header-row-editable-fieldset-name
Option.Help_Text__c: API name of a field set used by the Timecard object. Fields in this field set define the editable fields in the timecard header line in the Timecard UI.
Option.Description__c: API name of a field set used by the Timecard object. Fields in this field set define the editable fields in the timecard header line in the Timecard UI.

Option.Name: tc-header-row-left-editable-fieldset-name
Option.Help_Text__c: API name of a field set used by the Timecard object. Fields in this field set define the editable fields shown to the left of Hours in the timecard header line of the Timecard UI.
Option.Description__c: API name of a field set used by the Timecard object. Fields in this field set define the editable fields shown to the left of Hours in the timecard header line of the Timecard UI.

Option.Name: tc-header-row-readonly-fieldset-name
Option.Help_Text__c: API name of a field set used by the Timecard object. Fields in this field set define read-only fields in the timecard header line in the Timecard UI.
Option.Description__c: API name of a field set used by the Timecard object. Fields in this field set define read-only fields in the timecard header line in the Timecard UI.

Option.Name: tc-notes-field-editable-fieldset-name
Option.Help_Text__c: API name of a field set used by the Timecard object. Fields in this field set define editable fields in the Notes section in timecard lines in the Timecard UI.
Option.Description__c: API name of a field set used by the Timecard object. Fields in this field set define editable fields in the Notes section in timecard lines in the Timecard UI.

Option.Name: tc-notes-field-readonly-fieldset-name
Option.Help_Text__c: API name of a field set used by the Timecard object. Fields in this field set define read-only fields in the Notes section in timecard lines in the Timecard UI.
Option.Description__c: API name of a field set used by the Timecard object. Fields in this field set define read-only fields in the Notes section in timecard lines in the Timecard UI.

Option.Name: tc-sorted-by-order
Option.Help_Text__c: Config for holding the timecard sorted by order field API names. Multiple coma separated fields can be entered for sorting. Ex : CreatedDate, Project__r.Name
Option.Description__c: Config for holding the timecard sorted by order field API names. Multiple coma separated fields can be entered for sorting. Ex : CreatedDate, Project__r.Name

Option.Name: tc-status-to-hide
Option.Help_Text__c: Field is used to hold comma (,) separated list of timecard status values that will be hidden on the TC UI.
Option.Description__c: Field is used to hold comma (,) separated list of timecard status values that will be hidden on the TC UI.

Option.Name: timecard-approval-process-all-or-none
Option.Help_Text__c: This determines whether all Timecards auto-submitted for approval at once are handled in an 'all or none' fashion with respect to errors.
Option.Description__c: This determines whether all Timecards auto-submitted for approval at once are handled in an 'all or none' fashion with respect to errors.

Option.Name: timecard-auto-submit-for-approval
Option.Help_Text__c: If true, this auto-submits Timecard Headers to an existing Salesforce approval process (which must be implemented independently) based on Submitted flag.
Option.Description__c: If true, this auto-submits Timecard Headers to an existing Salesforce approval process (which must be implemented independently) based on Submitted flag.

Option.Name: timecard-cost-data-editable-after-billing
Option.Help_Text__c: If set to true, this will make the Timecard Header Cost Data (rate, daily, currency) editable even after the Timecard Header is marked as Billed or Invoiced. Default false.
Option.Description__c: If set to true, this will make the Timecard Header Cost Data (rate, daily, currency) editable even after the Timecard Header is marked as Billed or Invoiced. Default false.

Option.Name: timecard-edit-status-values
Option.Description__c: List of status values for which the timecard entry rows can be edited.

Option.Name: timecard-save-button-action
Option.Description__c: Used to determines what status the timecards will be set to on save button click

Option.Name: timecard-submit-button-action
Option.Description__c: Used to determines what status the timecards will be set to on submit button click

Option.Name: Timecard_Split_Time_Period_Types
Option.Help_Text__c: What time period types to split a Timecard across. Default values are 'Month' and 'Quarter' for Timecard Splitting. If values are removed, defaults to 'Perpetual', typically meaning no Timecard Splitting and one Timecard Split per Timecard in all situations.
Option.Description__c: What time period types to split a Timecard across. Default values are 'Month' and 'Quarter' for Timecard Splitting. If values are removed, defaults to 'Perpetual', typically meaning no Timecard Splitting and one Timecard Split per Timecard in all situat

Option.Name: top-assignments-to-show-count
Option.Description__c: Number of top assignments to be loaded to show on Project/assignment overlay

Option.Name: top-projects-to-show-count
Option.Description__c: Number of top projects to be loaded to show on Project/assignment overlay

Option.Name: update-approver-on-edit
Option.Help_Text__c: This config will decide whether to update the approver on timecard if it is edited. It is dependent on AssignProjectManagerToTimecardApprover config.
Option.Description__c: This cofig will decide whether to update the approver on timecard if it is edited. It is dependent on AssignProjectManagerToTimecardApprover config.

Option.Name: update-asn-milestone-from-tc-in-separate-threads
Option.Help_Text__c: If set to true, this forces updates from Timecard Splits to Assignments and Milestones to occur in separate future methods (only if asynchronous to start with). If false, the same updates will remain in a single future method invocation if asynchronous.
Option.Description__c: If set to true, this forces updates from Timecard Splits to Assignments and Milestones to occur in separate future methods (only if asynchronous to start with). If false, the same updates will remain in a single future method invocation if asynchronous.

Option.Name: update-assignments-with-timecard-costs
Option.Help_Text__c: If set to true (default) Timecard Assignments will be updated with Timecard cost data as well as hours and billables.
Option.Description__c: If set to true (default) Timecard Assignments will be updated with Timecard cost data as well as hours and billables.

Option.Name: update-milestones-with-timecard-costs
Option.Help_Text__c: If set to true (default) Timecard Milestones will be updated with Timecard cost data as well as hours and billables.
Option.Description__c: If set to true (default) Timecard Milestones will be updated with Timecard cost data as well as hours and billables.

Option.Name: update-tch-from-tc-sync
Option.Help_Text__c: If set to true, this forces updates from Timecard Splits to Timecard Headers to be synchronous. If false, the same updates may be asynchronous.
Option.Description__c: If set to true, this forces updates from Timecard Splits to Timecard Headers to be synchronous. If false, the same updates may be asynchronous.

Option.Name: use-fieldset-for-timecard-UI
Option.Help_Text__c: Allows you to switch your preferred method of managing visible fields on the Timecard Entry page. If False, PSA will use configuration options or custom settings to configure the UI. If True, PSA will use field sets to configure the UI.
Option.Description__c: Allows you to switch your preferred method of managing visible fields on the Timecard Entry page. If False, PSA will use configuration options or custom settings to configure the UI. If True, PSA will use field sets to configure the UI.

Option.Name: week-load-limit-for-top-assignment
Option.Description__c: Number of weeks for which top assignments/projects to loaded to show on project/assignment overlay

Option.Name: week-start-day
Option.Description__c: Default week start day value to be picked if Resource does not have a value for Contact.Work_Calendar__r.Week_Start_Day__c

Option.Name: weekend-color-code
Option.Help_Text__c: Given field/config is used to color code the date-column heading for Scheduled 0-hour days as per the Schedule Pattern (not Holidays) on the selected Resource's Work Calendar.
Option.Description__c: Given field/config is used to color code the date-column heading for Scheduled 0-hour days as per the Schedule Pattern (not Holidays) on the selected Resource's Work Calendar. Possible values for examples can be: - #93B0FB, red, blue etc.

Option.Name: width-px-for-milestone-drop-down
Option.Help_Text__c: Controls the pixel width for Milestone dropdown on Timecard Entry UI. Please specify a whole number for this value, as this will directly go into width. For ex a value 300 will set the dropdown width to 300px. Value specified for this config will override the default 80 pixel width of the dropdown.

Group.Name: Transaction Viewer
Group.Description__c: Config for the Transaction Viewer

Option.Name: show-project-parent-column
Option.Description__c: Whether to show the project parent (region/practice/group) column

Option.Name: show-target-currency-column
Option.Description__c: Whether to display an additional amount column in the region/practice/group's currency

Group.Name: Utilization
Group.Description__c: Contains configuration options pertaining to how Utilization is to be calculated.

Option.Name: old-ute-filter-on-is-resource-flag
Option.Help_Text__c: If set to true, then only Contact records with 'Is Resource' checked will be used for the OLD UTE calculation. Default false.
Option.Description__c: If set to true, then only Contact records with 'Is Resource' checked will be used for the OLD UTE calculation. Default false.

Option.Name: subtract-holidays-from-total-hours
Option.Description__c: Determines whether total time period hours should have applicable work calendar holiday hours subtracted for utilization calculation.

Option.Name: use-old-utilization-calc
Option.Help_Text__c: Determines whether to copy Utilization fields (e.g. Elapsed Hours/Total Hours) to Resource Actuals rather than from the new UTE Details. Set to false if using "new" UTE process as of the Spring '10 release, which does not use Resource Actuals, or to true if using old UTE process.
Option.Description__c: Determines whether to copy Utilization fields (e.g. Elapsed Hours/Total Hours) to Resource Actuals. Set to false if using "new" UTE process as of the Spring '10 release, which does not use Resource Actuals, or to true if using old UTE process.

Option.Name: use-resource-last-date
Option.Description__c: Determines whether Resource's last date limits total hour calculation for time period

Option.Name: use-resource-start-date
Option.Description__c: Determines whether Resource's first date limits total hour calculation for time period

Group.Name: Vendor Invoicing
Group.Description__c: Vendor Invoicing related configuration

Option.Name: convert-to-vendor-currency
Option.Help_Text__c: Functionality that allows the generation of vendor invoices in a currency different from the project, as is needed/requested by a vendor
Option.Description__c: Utilize Vendor Currency Conversion logic for Vendor Invoices

Option.Name: default-vendor-currency-by-account
Option.Help_Text__c: if set to false(default), on create Vendor Invoice's Vendor Currency field value is defaulted to Project CurrencyIsoCode. If config is set to true, on create Vendor Invoice's Vendor Currency field value is defaulted to Account CurrencyIsoCode. Either way the Vendor Currency field value can be updated subsequently to be any currency configured on the org.
Option.Description__c: Default the vendor Currency based on project (false) or vendor account (true)

Option.Name: new-items-query-limit
Option.Description__c: The maximum number of items to query for each invoice item type (expense, timecard, etc.) on the new invoice items page

Option.Name: salesforce-resource-required-for-invoice-creation
Option.Description__c: Whether a resource record is required for the current user is required to create a vendor invoice

Option.Name: set-quantity-and-unit-price-for-expenses
Option.Description__c: If true, for most Expenses, sets quantity to one and unit price to Expense (Reimbursement) Amount. For Expenses with an applied Expense Rate (distance, rate unit), sets quantity to Distance, and rate to Expense (Reimbursement) Amount divided by Distance.

Option.Name: set-quantity-and-unit-price-for-milestones
Option.Description__c: if true, sets quantity to one and unit price to Milestone Cost

Option.Name: set-quantity-and-unit-price-for-misc-adjustments
Option.Description__c: If true, sets quantity to one and unit price to Misc Adjustment amount.

Option.Name: set-quantity-and-unit-price-for-timecard-splits
Option.Description__c: If true, sets unit price to cost rate. If hourly rate, sets quantity to total hours, if daily rate, sets quantity to number to total days. Quantity times unit price should equal line item amount.

Option.Name: set-resource-for-expenses
Option.Description__c: If true, populates Vendor Invoice Item Resource lookup with Expense Resource.

Option.Name: set-resource-for-timecard-splits
Option.Description__c: If true, populates Vendor Invoice Item Resource lookup with Timecard Split Resource.
